directions: In a medium bowl, stir together the barbeque sauce, whiskey, Worcestershire sauce, ginger, cayenne pepper, paprika, chili powder, garlic powder, onion salt, oregano, red pepper flakes, sugar, ground black pepper, and hot pepper sauce. Cover, and keep refrigerated until ready to use.
ingredients: 1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper, or to taste
1/4 teaspoon hot pepper sauce, or to taste
title: Grant's Famous Midnight Grill BBQ Sauce
